thread.title: Green forest fire alert in Australia
thread.title_full: Green forest fire alert in Australia

title: Green forest fire alert in Australia
text:
Forest fire can have a low humanitarian impact based on the burned area and the affected population and their vulnerability.
*(Last detection of the thermal anomaly of the fire)
View more news
USGS estimates the number of casualties for each earthquake for the Prompt Assessment of Global Earthquakes for Response (PAGER) product. The graph shows the current fatalities estimate.
For this events, GDACS has links to information from the following sources: (2), EC-JRC (28), WMO (1), INFORM (2), JRC (1),
